name: Fire! Fight! Flight?
description:
Fire! Fight! Flight? is a basic platformer with a twist. The jump and attack mechanics are tied to the same action and resource. You can aim in any direction. And when you shoot in a particular direction, you are pushed in the opposite direction.

You can use these mechanics to:
- Travel faster
- Dodge enemy projectiles
- Perform last-minute saves from falling off of the platforms
- Perform attacks that feel super cool

Features:
- 5 different types of enemies
- Challenging end game boss
- Projectiles and motion follows the laws of physics

Controls:
Move Left - A
Move Right - D
Jump / Shoot - Left Mouse Button
Aim - Mouse
Restart - R
Quit - Esc

Developer's personal best time during release: 00:06:05

Pallete by: PolyPhorge
Music by: OrigamiRepetika
